issues.title: Fix login authentication bug
issues.description: Users are experiencing issues with login authentication. The system is not properly validating credentials and sometimes allows access with incorrect passwords.

issues.title: Implement user dashboard
issues.description: Create a comprehensive user dashboard that displays user profile information, recent activities, and quick access to common features.

issues.title: Database performance optimization
issues.description: Optimize database queries and indexes to improve overall application performance. Current response times are exceeding acceptable thresholds.

issues.title: Add dark mode support
issues.description: Implement dark mode theme option for the application interface. Should include toggle functionality and persistent user preference storage.

issues.title: Fix mobile responsive issues
issues.description: Several UI components are not properly responsive on mobile devices. Need to fix layout issues and ensure proper scaling across different screen sizes.

issues.title: Implement file upload feature
issues.description: Add capability for users to upload and manage files within the application. Should include file type validation and size restrictions.

issues.title: Security vulnerability patch
issues.description: Critical security vulnerability discovered in user input validation. Need immediate patch to prevent potential data breaches.

issues.title: Add email notifications
issues.description: Implement email notification system for important events like password changes, account updates, and system announcements.

issues.title: Fix search functionality
issues.description: Search feature is not returning accurate results and sometimes crashes when searching for special characters or long queries.

issues.title: Update API documentation
issues.description: Current API documentation is outdated and missing several endpoints. Need comprehensive update with examples and error codes.

issues.title: Implement user roles and permissions
issues.description: Create role-based access control system with different permission levels for administrators, moderators, and regular users.

issues.title: Add data export functionality
issues.description: Allow users to export their data in various formats (CSV, JSON, PDF) for backup or analysis purposes.

issues.title: Fix timezone display issues
issues.description: Application is not properly handling different timezones, causing confusion in date and time displays across different regions.

issues.title: Implement two-factor authentication
issues.description: Add 2FA support using SMS or authenticator apps to enhance account security for all users.

issues.title: Add social media integration
issues.description: Integrate social media platforms for easier user registration and sharing capabilities.

issues.title: Fix memory leak in image processing
issues.description: Image upload and processing functionality is causing memory leaks that eventually crash the application after extended use.

issues.title: Implement real-time chat
issues.description: Add real-time chat functionality between users with support for text, emojis, and file sharing.

issues.title: Add analytics dashboard
issues.description: Create comprehensive analytics dashboard showing user engagement, system performance metrics, and usage statistics.

issues.title: Fix payment processing errors
issues.description: Users are experiencing failures during payment processing. Need to investigate and fix the integration with payment gateway.

issues.title: Implement automated testing
issues.description: Set up comprehensive automated testing suite including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests for all critical functionality.

issues.title: Add multi-language support
issues.description: Implement internationalization (i18n) to support multiple languages including Spanish, French, German, and Chinese.

issues.title: Fix notification delivery
issues.description: Push notifications are not being delivered consistently across different devices and browsers.

issues.title: Implement backup system
issues.description: Create automated backup system for user data and system configurations with scheduled backups and recovery procedures.

issues.title: Add progress tracking
issues.description: Implement progress tracking system for long-running tasks with percentage completion and estimated time remaining.

issues.title: Fix calendar sync issues
issues.description: Calendar integration is not properly syncing with external calendar applications like Google Calendar and Outlook.

issues.title: Implement audit logging
issues.description: Add comprehensive audit logging system to track all user actions, system changes, and security events for compliance purposes.

issues.title: Add keyboard shortcuts
issues.description: Implement keyboard shortcuts for common actions to improve user productivity and accessibility.

issues.title: Fix video playback issues
issues.description: Video content is not playing properly on certain browsers and devices. Need to fix compatibility issues.

issues.title: Implement data validation
issues.description: Add comprehensive client-side and server-side data validation to prevent invalid data entry and improve data quality.

issues.title: Add report generation
issues.description: Create system for generating customizable reports with various data visualizations and export options.

issues.title: Fix API rate limiting
issues.description: API rate limiting is too restrictive and is blocking legitimate users. Need to adjust thresholds and implement better detection.

issues.title: Implement caching system
issues.description: Add intelligent caching system to improve application performance and reduce database load for frequently accessed data.

issues.title: Add accessibility features
issues.description: Implement WCAG 2.1 compliance features including screen reader support, keyboard navigation, and high contrast mode.

issues.title: Fix email template rendering
issues.description: Email templates are not rendering properly in various email clients, causing formatting issues and broken layouts.

issues.title: Implement data archiving
issues.description: Create system for archiving old data to improve performance and reduce storage costs while maintaining data accessibility.

issues.title: Add mobile app
issues.description: Develop native mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms to provide better user experience on mobile devices.

issues.title: Fix SSL certificate issues
issues.description: SSL certificate is expiring soon and there are compatibility issues with some older browsers and systems.

issues.title: Implement webhook system
issues.description: Create webhook system to allow third-party integrations to receive real-time notifications about system events.

issues.title: Add data import functionality
issues.description: Allow users to import data from various file formats (CSV, Excel, JSON) with validation and error handling.

issues.title: Implement feature flags
issues.description: Add feature flag system to enable/disable features dynamically and conduct A/B testing for new functionality.
